amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to ensure prompt restoration and rebuilding in the event of an activation of any floodway or backwater feature within the Mississippi Rivers and Tributaries system.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
